name: FROGLORY
description:
DO IT... FROGLORY!
FROGLORY is a challenging 2D Platform game in which you play as a cool frog that will bounce, run, jump and - obviously - manipulate time to break through increasingly harder and harder levels in order to reach and defeat the evil Masters of the Pyramid and restore balance between the animals of Temaphor.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF!
FROGLORY is a skill-based game that punishes both indecisiveness and impatience and requires also a little amount puzzle-solving skills to advance. Will you make it? Only one way to tell.
Find the Golden Flies scattered between levels and Collect them through minor  challenges and puzzles to unlock new glasses for the Cool Frog!

TRY THE DEMO... it's FREE!

FROGLORY is Fully Compatible with most Controllers! (Xbox, PS4, PS3, ecc.). Controllers are highly recommended if you care and dare to proceed further in your adventure in the lands of Temaphor.

Give me all the feedback you can so I can improve and - if you liked it - please consider a donation to help me make my game even better.

NOTE:
For those who donate more than 5€ : you will earn the right to participate in the Early-Access and all future updates will be free of cost.  When the full-game launches, you will receive a both a Steam and a itch.io Key for FROGLORY, no matter what the launch price may be.
